
{{alias}}( str )
    Lowercases the first character of a string.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Uncapitalized string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'Beep' )
    'beep'
    > out = {{alias}}( 'bOOp' )
    'bOOp'

    See Also
    --------
